participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Dreamy and ambitious, but struggles with responsibilities and enjoys music and outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I fantasize about living in another country. I am failing some of my classes. I enjoy electronic music. I enjoy nature. I am in a lot of debt.

content.text: Hi, I'm from Sterling Heights, Michigan. I have two kids, ages 2 and 6. My favorite movie is Titanic. I work part time at Aldi's.
Hi, I'm from California. I fantasize about living in another country. I am failing some of my classes. I enjoy electronic music. I enjoy nature. I am in a lot of debt.
Wow, you have a lot of interesting interests! I've always wanted to visit California. What's it like there?
It's beautiful, but it's also very expensive.
I can imagine. I've heard that the housing costs are really high.
Yeah, they are. But the weather is nice, and there's a lot to do.
What are some of your favorite things to do in California?
I love going to the beach, hiking, and camping. I also love going to concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not much of a beach person, but I love hiking and camping.
Well, you should definitely come to California sometime. We have some great hiking trails and campgrounds.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. So, what are your kids like?
They're great. They're really smart and funny.
That's great. I love kids.
Me too. I'm glad I have them.
I'm sure they're lucky to have you.
Thanks. I try to be a good mom.
I'm sure you are.
Thanks. So, what are you doing for school?
I'm studying to be a music teacher.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks. I hope so.
So, what are you doing now?
I'm working part time at a coffee shop.
Oh, that sounds fun. Do you like it?
It's okay. It's not my dream job, but it pays the bills.
Well, I'm sure you'll find your dream job eventually.
Thanks. I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to concerts, go to the beach, and hang out with friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to do a lot of the same things.
Well, it looks like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, we do. I'm glad we met.
Me too.
